laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Stool assay for C. difficile toxin A & B
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).

findings.lung: left lower lobe collapse, improved on the right side, grossly stable on the left side compared to prior study.
findings.spleen: severely enlarged measuring up to 20 cm (previously 18 cm)
findings.kidneys: both in normal anatomic location with symmetric enhancement, bilateral renal cysts
findings.gallbladder: contains numerous gallstones with air noted (new since prior exam)
findings.pancreas: areas of lack of enhancement compatible with pancreatic necrosis, multiple fluid collections surrounding the pancreas
findings.pelvic_fluid: small amount of free pelvic fluid
findings.prostate: mildly enlarged measuring 5.3 cm in transverse diameter

changes_over_time.gallbladder: presence of air in gallbladder noted as new since prior exam
changes_over_time.renal cysts: largest cyst remained stable at 4.4 cm
